text: The 2009-10 Austrian football championship was the 99th season of a top Austrian league. FC Red Bull Salzburg became Austrian champions, successfully defending their title. This was the sixth title for Salzburg and the third since the club Red Bull taken over. The champions of the second highest leaguewere FC Wacker Innsbruck. They returned to the top division after two seasons. The pay-TV broadcaster Sky Austria had the rights to show all games in full length. As in the previous year, it was supported by Tipp3 as the main sponsor and by T-Mobile Austria as a sub-sponsor. The official league name was therefore tipp3-Bundesliga powered by T-Mobile. ==Final table== Pl. Name M W D L P 1\. FC Red Bull Salzburg 36 22 10 4 76 2\. FK Austria Wien 36 23 6 7 75 3\.
